Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning to put the Rays away, 6-1
Post-Match Reflections: Guardians starter Joey Cantillo said, 'It was just a matter of time before the bats woke up.'
Thomas said, 'I’m almost glad I struggled a little bit and was able to expose something and fix what was wrong before the season ended.'

Vogt said, 'If you look at our offense over the course of the whole year, [Ramírez] and Nayls have carried the majority of the load, but when we’re at our best, not only are those guys going, but everyone else is contributing.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' lead in the American League Central remains at three games after the Royals won earlier in the day
The team is now 39-19 when Josh Naylor has at least one RBI
The Guardians traded for Lane Thomas at the Deadline to bring some extra energy to the lineup
